name: The Void (itch) (Octahedron Games)
description:
You're an electrician working the night shift at an office building when something suddenly feels... off. You can't recall arriving at the site. You get the feeling someone, or something, is watching you.

Collect batteries to keep your flashlight on, as something that stalks you from the dark beyond intends to end your shift early.

Is this place real? Are you real?

I made this proof of concept in a little over a week as a personal challenge and, well... safe to say I missed that Halloween deadline by a few days. Still figured I'd upload it and see what folks think of it! Was a fun little experiment to work on.

I won't be spending a ton more time on this but if any annoying bugs rear their heads feel free to leave a comment and I'll circle back around to it as soon as I can!
